name: Medieval Fighter
description:
Programming Language Used: C#

Game Engine Used: Unity

Team Size: Solo

Role: Designer/Programmer

  • Implemented enemy AI using state machine as part of the cursor-controlled combat system.
  • Implemented player movement with Unity's NavMesh system.
  • Programmed saving, inventory, and dialogue systems.
  • Created weapon pickups and a health potion consumable. 
  • Currently programming a quest system.

Controls:

  • Left click to move
  • Press "I" for inventory panel
  • Press "S" to save and "D" to delete save file
  • Press bottom right button on screen to show quest log
